programme.title: Wild City: Forest Life
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough narrates the award-winning Wild City series that explores the wild side of Singapore. Here on the fringes of the city, the jungle harbours some fascinating species, including many that have never been filmed before. The star of the show is the Raffles' banded langur, one of the least-known primates on the planet. Found only in Singapore and Malaysia, there are only a few hundred left and around 60 have made a home in Singapore's rainforests.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean sneaks into an indoor trampoline park, but a show-off boy keeps picking on him and Teddy.

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball
programme.desc: At Halloween show-and-tell, the class isn't buying Gumball's story about Gargaroth The Devourer until Carrie fakes a terrifying haunting. The kids convince the school to hire them as ghost exterminators, and take their payment in Halloween candy. But when it turns out Gargaroth is real, suddenly Gumball is expected to be the town's saviour.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Abracadabra-Doo
programme.desc: The gang goes on a trip to check on Velma's younger sister, Madelyn. She's been studying stage magic at the Whirlen Merlin Magic Academy, where apparently there have been sightings of a giant griffin. The gang decides to investigate...

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: During a chase, Lamput stumbles onto an underground primeval tribe. He gets mistakenly revered as the Chosen One. How are the Docs going to catch him now?

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders try to help Winston Whale by building him a mail truck, but Winston is used to working alone.

programme.title: Looney Tunes Cartoons
programme.desc: Yosemite Sam is big in Japan. Elmer should “bee” more careful. It’s lights out for Porky and Daffy.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings: World Tour
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a strange card game. One of the cards lands on a stone slab that transforms into lava.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: As Mr Bean settles down to watch his favourite TV programme he hears loud noises from next-door. He moves from house to garden but can’t escape the relentless cacophony of trumpets, electric drills, and screaming babies.

programme.title: Beyblade X
programme.desc: As Robin agonizes over which Bey he should use in the championship match, Multi tells him the history of Scythe Incendio.

programme.title: Lego Dc Comics Super Heroes: Justice League : Cosmic Clash
programme.desc: When Brainiac zaps Superman, Wonder Woman and Green Lantern to different places in time, the race is on for Batman and The Flash to re-assemble the Justice League!

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: After the other Titans are injured, Beast Boy donates his blood to save them.

programme.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
programme.desc: Mouse has built a rocket ship with enough power to take people to Mars.

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is in charge of keeping a snobby cat, Prancy Van der Snoot, clean and out of trouble. Unfortunately, she has her eye on Jerry who leads her on a manic chase through the manor.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Sometimes Mr. Bean’s Teddy can be no fun at all. Feeling the need for a new friend, Bean buys a parrot. But getting the parrot past his landlady and her one-eyed cat, Scrapper, proves to be no easy task. Next, is trying to get the blasted bird to speak.

programme.title: Looney Tunes Cartoons
programme.desc: Bugs wakes up to find Earth has been conquered by Martians and now must become Marvin’s loyal servant. Ralph Wolf tries on a myriad of disguises to catch sheep.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: The Justice League holds a talent competition to find a superhero worthy of joining the team.

programme.title: Beyblade X
programme.desc: Pendragon’s second Blader is Khrome Ryugu. Answering his call, Blader X takes to the stage too.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: When Ms. Baker pairs up the class to act as "parents" for a sprout, Sumo and Clarence learn all about good parenting, Jeff buys toys instead of fertiliser while Chelsea and Kimby get to know each other.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: A magical prism causes Raven to fragment into five distinct personalities which wreak havoc around town until the other Titans can figure out how to re-join her.

programme.title: My Adventures With Superman
programme.desc: Secret alien Clark Kent and his best friend Jimmy Olsen start their internship at The Daily Planet and meet fellow intern Lois Lane – who ropes them into investigating stolen military robots threatening Metropolis!

programme.title: My Adventures With Superman
programme.desc: Clark returns to the Kent farm with questions about where he’s from – and who he wants to be. Meanwhile, Lois and Jimmy track down the mercenary Livewire…and encounter “Superman” once again!

programme.title: My Adventures With Superman
programme.desc: Lois wants to interview Superman for The Daily Planet, and Clark must figure out how to help her while protecting his secret identity!

programme.title: My Adventures With Superman
programme.desc: Clark, Lois, and Jimmy cover a glitzy gala hosted by tech-billionaire Dr. Ivo – but while Clark and Lois wonder if this counts as a date, Ivo unleashes his newest invention: a creation that can bring down Superman!

programme.title: My Adventures With Superman
programme.desc: Lois uncovers a secret in Metropolis and is determined to get to the truth. Meanwhile, Superman tracks down dangerous weapons in the city…and finds himself in the crosshairs of mysterious organization Task Force X.

programme.title: Steven Universe
programme.desc: /Lion coughs up a magical key, and Steven goes on a quest to find what it unlocks.

programme.title: Regular Show
programme.desc: Tired of Mordecai always beating him at punchies and getting his way, Rigby decides to learn the martial art of "Death Kwon Do".

programme.title: Chowder
programme.desc: The gang discovers a cavern of precious rock candy crystals deep under Endive's house and try to raid it before she finds out.

programme.title: Courage The Cowardly Dog
programme.desc: Eustace goes to an institute that promises hair growth, dragging Courage along with him. The consequences that follow are hair-raising, indeed.

programme.title: Regular Show
programme.desc: Rigby's estranged accountant brother comes back to help save the park from an audit. While everyone loves Don, Rigby wants nothing to do with him.

programme.title: Chowder
programme.desc: When Gazpacho arrives home to find his mother missing, he mistakenly assumes that she's been taken hostage by ninjas.

programme.title: Courage The Cowardly Dog
programme.desc: Duck brothers from outer space kidnap Muriel. They've come to Nowhere to rescue another brother. Courage must save Muriel and ends up helping the brothers as well.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers that the frenzied "break dance" the Lemmings are doing is actually due to the fleas they are infested with. When Grizzy catches them too, it's panic all round! Grizzy is determined to eliminate the parasites, down to the very last one. The problem is his little roommates have no desire whatsoever to be treated...

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the ranger's collection of bird calls by chance.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is asked to wear a sheep costume to help advertise Irma’s knitwear stall, but he gets stuck in it!

programme.title: Nostalgia
programme.desc: Nostalgia aims to represent Chinese traditional culture by revealing life in villages in the way of story-telling. In this show, the audience can enjoy the natural and cultural backgrounds of Chinese traditional villages, and will find their knowledge of this oriental country expand through the interviews of Chinese people overseas whose memory and nostalgia can also reveal the very core value of the Chinese traditional culture.

programme.title: Across the Strait
programme.desc: The Across the Strait traces the much-discussed issues across the Strait, reflects the will of the citizens on two sides of the Strait and details the Chinese Government’s policy of “one country, two systems” in a bid to enhance the Taiwan fellowmen’s understanding of the Mainland China.

programme.desc: After a night out with friends, vulnerable India Chipchase is lured into a cab by a stranger promising to get her home safely. The following day, her body is found raped and strangled to death.

programme.title: Murdered At First Sight (S1)

programme.desc: Jim has been a collector from a very young age but some of the tragedies in his life have compounded Jim's hoarding behavior.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Mega Fat CEO Baby holds a game day at Baby Corp and Boss Baby must find a way to beat Mega Fat CEO Baby at his own game

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: It’s Chinese New Year! With Yi and Jin tied up in their respective CNY festival performances, Peng and a semi-disguised Everest hit the festive streets, eating and enjoying everything in sight. Meanwhile, while paying respects to her late father at a temple, Yi panics when an accident breaks her magical violin strings. She hurries back to find her friends, only to spot Peng and Everest and watch them get snatched up by a menacing, mysterious creature!

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: While searching for traps, Tuffnut, Barf and Belch get trapped themselves… and a forest fire is approaching.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: When a troll starts to ruin the fun of open mic night Poppy is forced to enter a compliment battle.Branch tries to drive Sky Toronto away when he moves next door.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: The kids have a race to decide who gets to try some extremely rare berries. / When Scallop finds a beautiful and mysterious sea sculpture, she enlists the help of her friends to search the sea for the artist behind the masterpiece.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When Pixie struggles to recreate an old tradition perfectly, the kids realize they can make their own traditions./ A story told by Chef J inspires Juniper to go in search of snow.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Tag and Scooch embark on a road trip to Chew York City to track down Kelly Korgi to ask her to perform at Pawston’s 100th birthday party.\ When Kelly Korgi tells Tag she can’t perform at Pawston’s 100th birthday party, she and Scooch decide to create a Kelly Korgi replacement so that she doesn’t break her promise to the town.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Tag tries to prove to Mom that she’s a big dog by puppysitting Yip and Rhonda all day. All she has to do is get them to the playground, but the pups keep running off. \ When a giant, bone-shaped, roller coaster ride goes missing from the Amusement Bark, Detectives Tag and Scooch take on the case of the slobbery robbery.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When the townsfolk decorate the Harmony Harbor holiday tree but lose the treetop star, TZG secretly search for it in the yard of a notoriously scary house. / When it transpires the house is not-so-scary after all and belongs to shy inventor Dr. Greenlittle, TZG secretly leads her to the big Harmony Harbor sing-along so that she doesn't have to spend the holiday alone.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Ian starts to sleepwalk around Harmony Harbor, TZG secretly guides him back to his own bed where he can continue sleeping safely. / When Felicia wants to run an obstacle course for the first time but is afraid she’ll embarrass herself, TZG secretly boosts her confidence by helping with practice.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Magnus and Axel unveil their new "mechano-dragon." It's impressive at first, but the Riders set out to prove it's no better than a bucket of bolts.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: In need of some rest and relaxation, the Riders head out on vacation. But their supposedly perfect island getaway isn't quite what they hoped for.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: As the Dragon Knights prepare to battle for the weapons and control of Tikal, Mastodon attempts to teach Po how to access storm powers to use in the fight. Blade comes face to face with Klaus and Veruca.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: The team heads into a final confrontation for the weapons that not only threatens Tikal, but their lives. And Po must share hero duties with Mastodon.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: As he tries to restore the magic spell that will protect San Lorenzo, Puss accidentally brings Artephius's macramé owl shop to life.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: While searching for items missing from the treasure house, Puss enlists the help of the Scimitar, an evil sword that turns its wielder wicked.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: While Spirit recovers from his injuries, Lucky helps out at the soda shop.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: While Lucky is eager to celebrate her first birthday on the frontier, a surprise visit from her Grandpa stirs up a controversy.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: After hearing a scary story Poppy tries to help Biggie get over his fearsHoping to enhance Mr. Dinkles selfconfidence Biggie enters him into a Bergen pet show.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Chef J tells Ollie he cooks with love. Kelp and Ollie set out to make food with love for him. When various food combos fail, Ollie considers giving up, because it isn’t good enough. Kelp goes to his Dad for answers, and two seemingly different ingredients form something magical. / When Cruz is not his usual upbeat self, Kelp tries various ways to cheer him up before realizing the best way to be a good friend is to just sit with him, and let him feel what he’s feeling.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: It’s Tag and Scooch’s first day of Race Cadets and Sam Whippet tells the Cadets that whoever can catch him in a race will be the new team captain. \ When Mom donates a box of Tag’s old toys to the new daycare center, Tag decides that the only way to get her box of toys back is to go around town collecting toys to swap out for her toys.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: Mr. Tanaka is moving places all by himself, so Team Zenko step in to assist, and learn the importance of asking people for help. / When Sam's skateboard competition falls on the same day as her favourite creator Ken KaBlam's comic book signing, TZG secretly prevents him leaving town before she gets the chance to meet him.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Burple and Winger each injure a wing while they're with Dak, and only teamwork can get them home. At the roost, Cutter gets stuck in a puddle of goo.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: Jindiao takes Po and the kids hostage in an attempt to locate the Wellspring

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his “big bad” year on the zodiac calendar – which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he “breaks up” with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items – but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toad’s magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Hiccup and the gang start a secret club to prepare for the Outcast offensive.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: When Meatlug accidentally ingests magnetic rocks, she becomes magnetic herself – causing destruction through the town, but ultimately helping the kids win a battle against the Outcasts.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: The kids go on a training mission on Dragon Island, where Hiccup runs into an old enemy – Dagur!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss thought that breaking his arm was painful;but the true pain starts at pediatrician Dr. Kevin’s “jokes.” Boss enlists the playgroup babies to defang the doctor of his “comedian’s disease.” Tim obsesses about keeping his little brother safe.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss has an opportunity to get his old job back at Baby Corp;but to get the interview;he’ll need the playgroup babies to help him escape Marsha Krinkle’s super-safe Bubbeezee playroom. Tim nearly misses Kabob Day at school.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss comes face to face with his old nemesis;Bug The Pug;after the playgroup parents decide to throw a Puppy Party. Staci creates a “No-Paperworkist” movement to avoid Buddy From HR’s constant paperwork.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: A run-of-the-mill arts and crafts session turns into an interdimensional adventure from which Harold, George and company may never return.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Krupp's campers take on rich rivals in a hoity-toity boat race that also features a revenge-obsessed giant salamander. Paging Captain Underpants!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: The campers' splat-tastic game of paintball is rather rudely interrupted by a foul and formidable fiend known only as Camoflush.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Tip battles an alien as angry as she is at the Boov's Angerspringa festival./Sharzod and Lucy become besties and call themselves the “Tush Twins.”

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: The snails are invited to perform on a cruise ship and while onboard Turbo encounters a group of rodent pirates who challenge him to a race—loser has to walk the plank/When Turbo is knocked out before a big charity race, Skidmark creates a shell that allows the crew to race the unconscious Turbo with a remote control.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: D-Structs loses his wrecking ball tail and wants to prove he's still dangerous, but when he gets stuck the crew must decide if they will save him.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: When Odlulu uses the Greek Myth Key to bring Greek myth to life and capture the Golden Fleece, the Wanderers embark on a legendary quest to restore order in modern Athens. With the help of Jason (of Argonaut fame) the Wanderers build a "Trojan Fritz" to help get past the Cyclops.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Mrs Goggins is spearheading a recycling initiative “A Greener Greendale” but has been overwhelmed by donations of plastic bottles and compost. Meanwhile, Pat picks up today's special delivery - blocks of ice to make an igloo at the school for their North Pole project. Pat and Ajay struggle to get the slippery blocks into PAT2, then Pat and Jess must endure a journey with the air-con on full blast to keep the blocks frozen. Despite this, the ice starts to melt on the way to the Schoolhouse. PC Selby is getting concerned by the overflowing recycling and deems it a traffic hazard. Ted and Alf help collect the recycling early but some of the plastic bottles spill onto the road, causing a road jam that blocks Pat. By the time he gets the blocks to the schoolhouse there is nothing left but tiny ice cubes. The children are disappointed but Pat remembers thinking the plastic bottles in the road earlier were ice. He and Ted unload the recycling and Lauren and the children use the plastic bottles to make a much warmer igloo instead. Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa always scratches his claws in the morning, but his scratching post has fallen apart. He sets off to find himself a new one in the jungliest bit. When he does eventually find a new scratching post it is huge, how is he going to get it home again?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Fuse is heartbroken when his new special toy wash is broken. Right before Revs could have a wash in it too! Noddy decides to investigate and help the little robot find out who has broken it. Using all his investigating skills and collecting evidence with the WhoWhatWhere Tablet Noddy realises that it's his own best beloved car, Revs, who broke the toy wash! Poor Revs thought that if he went through the toy wash he'd miss his special time with Noddy and Bumpy. Noddy finds a way for Revs to enjoy the toy wash AND still has his special playtime with his best friends. Clever Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Stingo is bored and plays all manner of naughty tricks on the other tots. Fifi teaches Stingo that he will have more fun if he helps people rather than being mean to them.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and Scallop pet-sit Crabby, who acts out until they realize he’s missing home. / Kelp feels like he can’t choose between a celebration on land or under the sea. So he attempts to do both... at the same time!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: The Rescue Riders have a "Dragon Day" to show their skills to a young fan, but Aggro skips it to hang out with her new fun -- but reckless -- friends.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After being made fun of for sitting in chocolate pudding, George and Harold go into hiding only to come back to find that everybody has forgotten who they are

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and Blade rush to warn the Emperor about the weasels, but he has Po arrested and Colin captures Blade, revealing that she was never a knight. Thrown in a cell, Po reunites with Rukhmini and Mr. Ping, and he copes with the truth about Blade as they break out. Po fights Klaus and Veruca but is outmatched. Blade defeats Colin and hurries to help Po but is too late.

programme.desc: When Mega Fat tries to get Boss Baby fired while on an airplane to Pairs, Tim and Staci must prevent a baby meltdown

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his “big bad” year on the zodiac calendar – which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he “breaks up” with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items – but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toad’s magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Tip battles an alien as angry as she is at the Boov's Angerspringa festival./Sharzod and Lucy become besties and call themselves the “Tush Twins.”

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: The snails are invited to perform on a cruise ship and while onboard Turbo encounters a group of rodent pirates who challenge him to a race—loser has to walk the plank/When Turbo is knocked out before a big charity race, Skidmark creates a shell that allows the crew to race the unconscious Turbo with a remote control.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: D-Structs loses his wrecking ball tail and wants to prove he's still dangerous, but when he gets stuck the crew must decide if they will save him.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: When Odlulu uses the Greek Myth Key to bring Greek myth to life and capture the Golden Fleece, the Wanderers embark on a legendary quest to restore order in modern Athens. With the help of Jason (of Argonaut fame) the Wanderers build a "Trojan Fritz" to help get past the Cyclops.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Mrs Goggins is spearheading a recycling initiative “A Greener Greendale” but has been overwhelmed by donations of plastic bottles and compost. Meanwhile, Pat picks up today's special delivery - blocks of ice to make an igloo at the school for their North Pole project. Pat and Ajay struggle to get the slippery blocks into PAT2, then Pat and Jess must endure a journey with the air-con on full blast to keep the blocks frozen. Despite this, the ice starts to melt on the way to the Schoolhouse. PC Selby is getting concerned by the overflowing recycling and deems it a traffic hazard. Ted and Alf help collect the recycling early but some of the plastic bottles spill onto the road, causing a road jam that blocks Pat. By the time he gets the blocks to the schoolhouse there is nothing left but tiny ice cubes. The children are disappointed but Pat remembers thinking the plastic bottles in the road earlier were ice. He and Ted unload the recycling and Lauren and the children use the plastic bottles to make a much warmer igloo instead. Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa always scratches his claws in the morning, but his scratching post has fallen apart. He sets off to find himself a new one in the jungliest bit. When he does eventually find a new scratching post it is huge, how is he going to get it home again?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Fuse is heartbroken when his new special toy wash is broken. Right before Revs could have a wash in it too! Noddy decides to investigate and help the little robot find out who has broken it. Using all his investigating skills and collecting evidence with the WhoWhatWhere Tablet Noddy realises that it's his own best beloved car, Revs, who broke the toy wash! Poor Revs thought that if he went through the toy wash he'd miss his special time with Noddy and Bumpy. Noddy finds a way for Revs to enjoy the toy wash AND still has his special playtime with his best friends. Clever Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Stingo is bored and plays all manner of naughty tricks on the other tots. Fifi teaches Stingo that he will have more fun if he helps people rather than being mean to them.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and Scallop pet-sit Crabby, who acts out until they realize he’s missing home. / Kelp feels like he can’t choose between a celebration on land or under the sea. So he attempts to do both... at the same time!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: The Rescue Riders have a "Dragon Day" to show their skills to a young fan, but Aggro skips it to hang out with her new fun -- but reckless -- friends.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and Blade rush to warn the Emperor about the weasels, but he has Po arrested and Colin captures Blade, revealing that she was never a knight. Thrown in a cell, Po reunites with Rukhmini and Mr. Ping, and he copes with the truth about Blade as they break out. Po fights Klaus and Veruca but is outmatched. Blade defeats Colin and hurries to help Po but is too late.

programme.title: The Curious Life And Death Of...
programme.desc: Uncover the bizarre demise of the world’s most famous magician. Watch experts recreate Houdini’s legendary escapes to determine whether his death was accidental, or if he was the victim of a powerful group that wanted him dead.

programme.title: Tom Hanks: The Nomad
programme.desc: From humble beginnings to an aspiring thespian to acting as some of the world’s most iconic and notable characters. He has picked up a reputation as ‘America’s Nice Guy’, ’The Everyman’ and a nomad of the arts. But we all know him… as Tom Hanks.

programme.title: Kate Winslet: Leading Lady
programme.desc: Oscar-winner Kate Winslet, known for Titanic, is celebrated for her versatile, intense performances in both Hollywood blockbusters and indie films, cementing her as one of the finest actors of her generation.

programme.title: Bruce Willis: All American Hero
programme.desc: Bruce Willis became a star with his iconic role as John McClane in Die Hard, leading to a legendary career with over 100 films. Known for his charm and humor, his career faced a tragic setback in 2022.

programme.title: The Moviemakers
programme.desc: With over 50 years in the industry, not many filmmakers can boast the longevity and influence of Steven Spielberg, whose journey from the suburbs of Arizona to the spotlight of Hollywood is one of the greatest stories ever told.

programme.title: The Moviemakers
programme.desc: 60 years since his directorial debut, Martin Scorsese's life has been dedicated to the past, present and future of cinema. Named Caretaker of Cinema, Martin Scorsese continues to push the boundaries of moviemaking.

programme.title: The Moviemakers
programme.desc: Since the early 1990s, Quentin Tarantino has been on a cinematic rollercoaster ride, that’s never looked like slowing down, that has cemented himself as one of the worlds most influential filmmakers.

programme.title: The Moviemakers
programme.desc: Spike Lee has always been a controversial and political filmmaker whose films speak for themselves. Over 40 years since his debut in the world of film, Spike continues to push boundaries in America.

programme.title: The Hunt For Eagle 56
programme.desc: Join the race against time as the team hunts for the sunken Eagle 56 boilers before winter sets in so they can finally reveal discoveries to the Navy and the families of the warship’s crew.

programme.title: 9/11: Stories In Fragments
programme.desc: Among the ruins of the buildings destroyed on 9/11, the everyday items and the ordinary citizens that discovered them share their stories of that unforgettable day.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That? S2
programme.desc: Mike Davidson embeds with the team of one of the most extreme, avalanche-prone mountain ski mountains in the world - Snowbird. They battle to keep the steep and deep slopes safe with shovels, snowcats and even a WWII Howitzer cannon.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That? S2
programme.desc: Mike Davidson goes to the biggest automated package sorting facility in the world - UPS Worldport in Louisville, Kentucky. Two million packages go through here every day, and it's up to the hardhat heroes behind the scenes to make it all happen.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That? S2
programme.desc: In Philadelphia, Mike Davidson is on streets, in tunnels, on tracks and in trolley restoration garages - working shoulder-to-shoulder with the team that keeps one of America's largest and oldest mass transit systems running smoothly and on time.

programme.title: The Real Mad Men Of Advertising
programme.desc: Examine '60s ad men and women and how they used wit and irony to reach a new audience, consequently revolutionizing the industry.

programme.desc: See how stricter rules and public mistrust inspired 1970s advertisers to create some of history's greatest campaigns.

programme.desc: Fran Fine turns up on the doorstep of Maxwell Sheffield and finds herself the nanny of Maxwell's three children: Maggie, Brighton, and Grace. Maxwell Sheffield is unhappy about it at first, but Fran turns out to be just what he and his family needed.

programme.title: CSI S3 E01 - Revenge is Best Served Cold
programme.desc: The series enters its third season riding high as network television's top-rated drama. There is, therefore, no need for CBS to make any major cast changes, however, there are two significant additions to the cast lineup for season 3. A romantic interest is created for series regular Jorja Fox (Sara Sidle) in the form of Hank Peddigrew (Christopher Wiehl), a handsome paramedic. Also, recurring character Detective Lockwood ( Jeffrey D. Sams ) is seen on a more frequent basis. The season's most significant story development involves CSI head man Gil Grissom ( William L. Petersen ). After a few instances in which he notices that he is experiencing some hearing loss, Grissom is diagnosed with a hereditary disorder which threatens to culminate in total deafness. As the season draws to a close, Grissom undergoes surgery to correct this problem, however the results of the operation remain unclear until the beginning of season four.

programme.title: The Slave Hunters
programme.desc: Slaves fervently wishing to live like a human being VS. Slave hunters chasing them tirelessly. A bloody battle between them begins to take place!!! Being a slave hunter, Daegil is disregarded by people due to his low social status. While doing his job, Daegil is offered by Lee Gyongsuk to get Song Taeha and is promised to be given a fair amount of money as a reward. Taeha was forced to become a state slave as he was wrongfully accused of stealing some provisions. After reading a secret message saying the life of Sohyeons youngest son is on the line, Taeha tries to escape in an attempt to save him, the eldest son of the Crown Prince. Daegil, however, gets wind of his plan and the two ends up fighting a bloody fight. Having barely escaped from the fierce fight, Taeha happens to accompany a woman named Hyewon. Daegil fails to track down the slave he was first assigned to capture, and constantly runs into Seolhwa who escaped from a troupe of strolling actors. To make things worse, Daegil is threatened to be killed by a group of slaves who formed a hit squad to assassinate nobles. As for Daegil, he has every reason to be successful in accomplishing his first mission. Aside from recovering his pride hurt by Taeha, Daegil needs a sizable sum of money to live a comfortable life in his old age. In the end, Taeha manages to run away from Daegil while Daegil feels affection for Hyewon.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan natin ang tungkol sa pagpapantig, pagbibigay ng kahulugan sa mga salita, pagbuo ng mga pangungusap, at pagbabasa ng teksto. Tinatalakay din dito ang mga pang-ukol, pang-abay, at salitang kilos.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about time, standard measures of length, mass and capacity and area using square-tile units. These also deepen the understanding about pictographs without and with scales.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about pronouns and prepositions. These episodes also show how to read, match, and write words that use short vowels.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Palipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tatalakayin ang pagpapahalaga sa kagalingang pansibiko bilang pakikibahagi sa mga layunin ng sariling komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tinatalakay ang tungkol sa mga pangngalan, panghalip, at iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento. Ipapaliwanag din dito ang pagsusulat ng mga kuwento at pagbibigay ng kahulugan ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach about conversion of time, linear, mass and capacity measures and area of square and rectangle. These episodes also talk about bar graphs and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: These epsiodes are about adjectives, adverbs, maps and graphs. These episodes also show how to read words and restate facts from texts.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa gawaing pangkabuhayan at bahaging ginagampanan ng pamahalaan at ang mga kasapi nito, mga pinuno at iba pang naglilingkod tungo sa pagkakaisa, kaayusan at kaunlaran ng mga lalawigan sa kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about people, animals, plants, landforms and bodies of water, and their importance. These also talk about the types and effects of weather as they relate to daily activities, health and safety, and the natural objects in the sky affect one’s daily activities.

programme.title: Grade 5 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagbibigay ng mga mahalagang pangyayari, paksa, at opinyon tungkol sa napakinggan o nabasang teksto. Matutuhan din dito ang wastong pagbaybay sa mga salita at paglalarawan ng tagpuan at tauhan.

programme.title: Grade 5 Math
programme.desc: These episodes are about area, volume, and temperature. These episodes also explain line graphs and experimental probability.

programme.title: Grade 5 English
programme.desc: These episodes focus on analyzing visual and multimedia elements and writing paragraphs and articles.

programme.title: Grade 5 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ay pag-uusapan ang bahaging ginampanan ng kolonyalismong Espanyol at pandaigdigang koteksto ng reporma sa pag- usbong ng kamalayang pambansa patungo sa pagkabuo ng Pilipinas bilang isang nasyon.

programme.title: Grade 5 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain how weathering and soil erosion shape the Earth’s surface and affect living things and the environment. These episodes also discuss about weather disturbances and their effects, the phases of the Moon and the beliefs and practices, associated with it, and the constellations and the information derived from their location in the sky.

programme.title: Grade 7 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito susuriin ang iba't ibang mga akda ayon sa mga tauhan, kaisipan, at saloobin na nakapaloob dito. Tatalakayin din ang pagsusulat ng sariling pananaw at ideya tungkol sa napakinggan.

programme.title: Grade 7 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach the key concepts, uses, and importance of statistics, data collection/gathering and the different forms of data representation, measures of central tendency, measures of variability, and probability.

programme.title: Grade 7 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach writing and composing essays. These also feature Philippine literature and theater.

programme.title: Grade 7 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagtugon ng mga Asyano sa mga hamon ng pagbabago, pag-unlad at pagpapatuloy ng Silangan at Timog-Silangang Asya sa Transisyonal at Makabagong Panahon (ika-16 hanggang ika-20 Siglo).

programme.title: Grade 7 Science
programme.desc: These episodes talk about the relation of geographical location of the Philippines to its environment, the different phenomena that occur in the atmosphere, the relationship of the seasons and the position of the Sun in the sky, and the occurrence of eclipses.

programme.title: Grade 9 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri ng iba't ibang akda na may kaugnayan sa kulturang Asyano batay sa mga elemento nito. Ipapaliwanag din dito kung paano maglahad at maghambing ng mga pananaw.

programme.title: Grade 9 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about the basic concepts of trigonometry.

programme.title: Grade 9 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the relevance worth of ideas, soundness of author’s reasoning, and the effectiveness of a presentation. These also explain critical issues that demand sound analysis and call for prompt actions.

programme.title: Grade 9 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa mga sektor ng ekonomiya at mga patakarang pang- ekonomiya nito sa harap ng mga hamon at pwersa tungo sa pambansang pagsulong at pag-unlad.

programme.title: Grade 9 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain the projectile motion, impulse and momentum, and conservation of linear momentum, conservation of mechanical energy, the relationship among heat, work, and efficiency. These episodes also talk about generation, transmission, and distribution of electrical energy from power plants to home.

programme.title: Extracurricular
programme.desc: These episodes feature different short animations and documentaries that are related to arts and culture.

programme.title: Extracurricular

programme.title: Alternative Learning System
programme.desc: These episodes focus on the process of planning, setting up, and running a small business. These episodes also talk about entrepreneurial skills.

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the characteristics and needs of animals and plants and how they grow and the physical properties and movement of objects. These also talk about the different types of weather and changes that occur in the environment, the concepts of size, length, weight, time, and money, and the sense of quantity and numeral relations.

programme.title: Grade 1 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri ng mga pabula, tugma, tula, balita, at kuwento. Pinakikita rin dito ang tamang paggamit ng malalaki at maliliit na titik, mga pangngalan, at tamang pagbasa ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: These episodes discuss time and non-standard units of length, mass and capacity. These episodes also talk about pictographs without scales and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 1 English
programme.desc: These episodes talk about action words and describing words. These episodes also teach about sorting and classifying words and following directions.

programme.title: Grade 1 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapaliwanag ang konsepto ng distansya sa paglalarawan ng sariling kapaligirang ginagalawan tulad ng tahanan at paaralan at ng kahalagahan ng pagpapanatili at pangangalaga nito.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan natin ang tungkol sa pagpapantig, pagbibigay ng kahulugan sa mga salita, pagbuo ng mga pangungusap, at pagbabasa ng teksto. Tinatalakay din dito ang mga pang-ukol, pang-abay, at salitang kilos.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about time, standard measures of length, mass and capacity and area using square-tile units. These also deepen the understanding about pictographs without and with scales.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about pronouns and prepositions. These episodes also show how to read, match, and write words that use short vowels.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Palipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tatalakayin ang pagpapahalaga sa kagalingang pansibiko bilang pakikibahagi sa mga layunin ng sariling komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tinatalakay ang tungkol sa mga pangngalan, panghalip, at iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento. Ipapaliwanag din dito ang pagsusulat ng mga kuwento at pagbibigay ng kahulugan ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach about conversion of time, linear, mass and capacity measures and area of square and rectangle. These episodes also talk about bar graphs and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: These epsiodes are about adjectives, adverbs, maps and graphs. These episodes also show how to read words and restate facts from texts.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa gawaing pangkabuhayan at bahaging ginagampanan ng pamahalaan at ang mga kasapi nito, mga pinuno at iba pang naglilingkod tungo sa pagkakaisa, kaayusan at kaunlaran ng mga lalawigan sa kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: KABUKI KOOL
programme.desc: Discover the historic and modern kabuki plays based on bestsellers! Actor Kataoka Ainosuke explores 2 plays from the Edo period and one based on a modern manga series, Naruto.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Core Kyoto
programme.desc: Traditional carpentry employs wooden joinery in furnishings to fit pieces of wood together without use of metal nails. Artisans breathe new life into the wood, imbuing a Kyoto aesthetic as they work.

programme.title: NHK NEWS 7

programme.title: Core Kyoto

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Sakana-kun (Fish Guy) is a self-taught marine biologist based in Chiba. He speaks about his endless curiosity for new fish knowledge, as well as the crisis currently facing the planet's marine life.

programme.title: 1/10: Married By Matching Apps
programme.desc: 1 in 10 Japanese got married through online spouse-hunting services in 2020. We interview women who use matchmaking apps, including Manami, who uses multiple apps to find a perfect partner.

programme.title: The Seasons of Yamato
programme.desc: A series of poetic videos by Koichi Hozan, a videographer living in Nara, in collaboration with a pianist, Mine Kawakami, for which she plays exclusive pieces, makes you experience each seasons.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE: A Bedtime Routine
programme.desc: On those hot, humid summer nights, nothing can get in the way of sleep like mosquitoes on the hunt. We learn about the tools the Edo townspeople had at their disposal to fight the pesky insects.

programme.title: Watch Out For Barbabright / If I Were A Billionaire
programme.desc: The twins visit Barbabright's room. // If I were a billionaire, what would I do to achieve my dreams?

programme.title: Paddington Vs The Seagulls / Paddington And The Lighthouse
programme.desc: Paddington learns that seagulls love chips and will do anything to get them, but can he deliver lunch while it is still hot? // The lighthouse light is broken, and on a foggy night too, can Paddington help save the boat at sea?

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Library Tea Shop / The Crew Builds A Dance Floor
programme.desc: Construction on the first Builder Cove library is abuzz with bees! This calls for an extra sweet constuction solution. / Grandpa Gravel teaches Charger all his best moves for the big dance contest. But will a runaway disco ball cost them first place?

programme.title: Partly Claudia / Ranita's Magic Stripes
programme.desc: Dora and Boots take Claudia, an energetic young rain cloud, to rain on a dry water slide. / Boots gets a case of Tickle Tail that Ranita the Frog can cure if she gets her magic stripes by helping friends around the Rainforest.

programme.title: The Island of Lost Treasure
programme.desc: Somewhere, on The Island of Lost Treasure, there are incredible riches just waiting to be discovered. And Blaze and Darington are determined to be the first to find them!

programme.title: Fwendsgiving Feast / Blueberry Crumble
programme.desc: Chef wants to make a special dish for every single friend coming to Fwendsgiving, but struggles to do it all in time. // The gang treks to The Other Side of the Fence so Olly can pick the first blueberry of the season.

programme.title: Sharkdog, Family
programme.desc: When the town discovers Sharkdog, Max needs to convince everyone that he's not a monster.

programme.title: The Sharkdog Days of Summer
programme.desc: Max and Sharkdog want to enjoy the last day of summer, but first, they have to deal with the mess they left at home.

programme.title: No Fishes in This School
programme.desc: It's the first day of school, and Sharkdog's not allowed to come; well, that's never stopped him before!

programme.title: A Mail Whale Tale / Swimming With The Sharks
programme.desc: When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure. // Baby and his family get their own reality TV show-- what could go wrong?

programme.title: Assembly Required
programme.desc: The Sharks order a new table and discover they have to built it themselves.

programme.title: Pups Leave Marshall Home Alone / Pups Save the Deer
programme.desc: With the other pups at parachute training, Marshall must get a group of loose kittens back all by himself. But he has the help of the other pups' packs! // Ryder and the PAW Patrol rescue a family of deer stuck on slippery ice!

programme.title: Pups Save a Yodeler
programme.desc: When Wingnut runs away from wolves that are attracted to his yodeling, he ends up trapped in a canyon. The Paw Patrol has to hurry to save him.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Gym / The Crew Puts On A Construction Show
programme.desc: Coach Karima asks Rubble & Crew to build a gym for the gymnastics show. But when the beam is too high for Lily, it's up to the pups to save the day.//When a traveling show can't get to Builder Cove, Rubble & Crew decides to build a show of their own!

programme.title: Captain Daddy Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her family borrow Grandpa Pig’s boat for a day on the river. Daddy Pig is the captain, Peppa, George and Mummy Pig are the crew. When the boat gets stuck in some long reeds. Daddy Pig has to use all his strength to push the boat free.

programme.title: The Powercut
programme.desc: One day all the lights suddenly go out and Peppa’s house is plunged into darkness. There has been a power cut. While they wait for the electricity to come on again, Peppa and George have fun looking for a torch and thinking of games to play.

programme.title: Daddy Pig's Birthday
programme.desc: Today is Daddy Pig's birthday, but he has to go to work. While he is away, Mummy Pig, Peppa and George prepare a special birthday surprise.

programme.title: Sleepover
programme.desc: Peppa is going for a sleepover at Zoë Zebra’s house with Suzy Sheep, Rebecca Rabbit, Candy Cat and Emily Elephant. The girls stay up playing games and having fun. At last they feel sleepy. They all snuggle up in their sleeping bags and fall asleep.

programme.title: The Ukulele
programme.desc: Anna, Froga and Ron make up a song that Anna plays on her ukulele. But they accidentally end up breaking her cherished instrument in half! Ron and Froga do everything they can to stop Anna from finding out, finally they need to confess their mistake.

programme.title: The Cuddle Toy
programme.desc: Christopher is sad because he lost his cuddly toy so Bubu gives him his to use. But when Christopher looses that one too, it's a desperate search for missing cuddlies until Anna saves the day!

programme.title: Fwendsgiving Feast / Blueberry Crumble
programme.desc: Chef wants to make a special dish for every single friend coming to Fwendsgiving, but struggles to do it all in time. // The gang treks to The Other Side of the Fence so Olly can pick the first blueberry of the season.

programme.title: Mac and Cheese
programme.desc: Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen!

programme.title: Cattle Drive
programme.desc: When Blaze and Starla encounter a herd of cows wandering out in the desert, they must embark on a wild west adventure to bring them back to Starla’s barn.

programme.title: Snow Rescue Blaze
programme.desc: When a big ski mishap gets Crusher and Pickle stuck super far away, Blaze and AJ will perform a daring snow rescue to save the day.

programme.title: Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf
programme.desc: When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him. // When Everest joins the Paw Patrol for a visit to the jungle, she makes friends with a clumsy elephant calf and then must help rescue him.

programme.title: Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger
programme.desc: When Mayor Humdinger tricks Katie into watching his kitties, an alarm is set off and the Paw Patrol must rescue them. // Mayor Humdinger swipes one of Ryder's early inventions - an aircraft and must be rescued from an out-of-control flight.

programme.title: Pups Raise the Paw Patroller
programme.desc: Daring Danny’s at it again, luckily the Pups are able to raise their rig after Danny sinks the Paw Patroller.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Library Tea Shop / The Crew Builds A Dance Floor
programme.desc: Construction on the first Builder Cove library is abuzz with bees! This calls for an extra sweet constuction solution. / Grandpa Gravel teaches Charger all his best moves for the big dance contest. But will a runaway disco ball cost them first place?

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Giant Lemonade Stand / The Crew Builds A Wildlife Bridge
programme.desc: After the Crew builds a special lemonade stand for Lucas and Lily, a sour Speed Meister sends it rolling through Builder Cove! // Why does Crunchy the beaver cross the road? Because Rubble & Crew build a bridge to help him get to the other side!

programme.title: Catch The Quickatoo / Lost Lorito
programme.desc: Abuela shows Dora her photo album of birds, with one page blank: the Quickatoo. Dora vows to find the Quickatoo and get a picture to complete the album. // Dora and Boots help a baby parrot named Lorito find his Mami, but he can't stop copying Boots!

programme.title: A Tail Of Two Fathers / The Welcome Wagon
programme.desc: It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp. // When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: The Fast and The Fishy
programme.desc: Max is determined to win this year's obstacle course race, but that may be difficult with Sharkdog always trying to help.

programme.title: The Big Picture
programme.desc: Sharkdog is very excited to be in the annual Fisher family photo, but disaster after disaster threatens his perfect picture.

programme.title: Air Sharkdog
programme.desc: When Dennis challenges the Sharkpack to a game of 3-on-3 basketball, Sharkdog reveals he's an amazing player. So amazing, he may end up taking Max's spot!

programme.title: Stars
programme.desc: It is night time and the sky is full of stars. Mummy and Daddy Pig let Peppa and George put their coats on and they go outside to look at the stars. The stars look very tiny, but when Peppa and George look through a telescope the stars look bigger.

programme.title: Work and Play
programme.desc: When Peppa and Suzy learn that grown ups must work all day, they decide to play at working in a store. But they quickly get tired of it.

programme.title: The Rainbow
programme.desc: Peppa and her family spot a rainbow when they go for a drive.

programme.title: Pedro's Cough
programme.desc: Pedro gets a contagious cough at daycare and other children soon catch it. When it's time to go the grown-ups catch it too, including Madame Gazelle. Doctor Brown Bear gives them terrible-tasting medicine, but who will look after him when he is sick?

programme.title: Fwendsgiving Feast / Blueberry Crumble
programme.desc: Chef wants to make a special dish for every single friend coming to Fwendsgiving, but struggles to do it all in time. // The gang treks to The Other Side of the Fence so Olly can pick the first blueberry of the season.

programme.title: The Mountain Eater / The First Day Of School
programme.desc: Barbapapa tells the Barbababies about his extraordinary encounter with a wolf. // Tomorrow is the Barbababies' first day of school.

programme.title: The Barbapapa Tree / The Barbababies' birthday
programme.desc: Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals. // It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: Paddington's Mysterious Cave Discovery / Paddington And The Fossil Hunt
programme.desc: What's making the strange noises in the cave? Jonathan thinks it's a mermaid, but Paddington isn't so sure // Judy wants to find a fossil on the beach, everyone else seems to be getting lucky except her, can Paddington help?

programme.title: The Race Around the Earth
programme.desc: In their biggest race ever, Blaze and AJ go head-to-head against Crusher to race all the way around the Earth and win the World's Biggest Trophy!

programme.title: Pups Save Baby Humdinger / Pups Save a Pinata
programme.desc: Tracker has a dream that Mayor Humginder turns into a baby! Now it's up to the pups to find the special coconuut to reverse the spell. // Alex is hosting a fun party in Adventure Bay but is heartbroken when his special pinata mysteriously disappears.

programme.title: Pups Save the Kitty Rescue Crew / Pups Save an Ostrich
programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger makes fake emergencies for his kitties to save so they appear better then the PAW Patrol. // The Wingnuts get a new pet ostrich, but it gets lost on the trip home. The PAW Patrol must find and lead it to the Wingnuts' ranch.

programme.desc: When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure. // Baby and his family get their own reality TV show-- what could go wrong?

programme.title: The Blaze Family
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ are spending the day with some very special trucks: Blaze's family! His Mom, Dad, and little sister Sparkle join Blaze in a race against Crusher to prove they're the world's fastest family!

programme.desc: The Paw Patrol searches for Julia, Julius and a flamingo when they go missing from a dance contest. // The Paw Patrol comes to the rescue when Mayor Goodway and her niece Julia get stuck on a runaway art installation.

programme.desc: When Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta get trapped inside a mesa, it's up to the Paw Patrol and a little snake to rescue them. // When Humdinger's mom Helga loses her son's phony trophy, the Paw Patrol have to rescue her and the trophy.

programme.title: Pups Save the Crows
programme.desc: Ryder and the Pups pair up with Alex and his mini patrol to retrieve mysteriously missing items.

programme.title: The Crew and Chase Are On The Case
programme.desc: There's a mystery afoot in Builder Cove! When the sculpture of all the townsfolk suddenly disappears, Chase joins Rubble & Crew to solve the case of the missing statue...and build a brand new Science Center to help investigate.

programme.title: The Crew Fixes The Talent Show Stage / The Crew Builds Instruments
programme.desc: When Speed Meister sabotages the stage for the town Talent Show, the pups use Motor's talent to save the day. // Sierra Sparkle is coming to sing for Builder Cove Day! But when the band's instruments break, Rubble & Crew have a construction solution.

programme.title: Rainbow's Lost Colors / Boots' Rubber Band Ball
programme.desc: The twins are excited to see their first rainbow, but it's missing its colors! Dora sets off to return its azul, rojo, y amarillo. // Boots' rubber band ball bounces into the Forest Next Door, and he must ask Cynthia the Centipede to get it back.

programme.title: The Masked Fishy / The Best Friends Game
programme.desc: When a mysterious masked fish is causing trouble for Goldie's magnum opus, Detective Baby Shark must catch the culprit. // When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up to stop them on live TV.

programme.title: Sick as a Sharkdog
programme.desc: When Sharkdog comes down with a mysterious cold, Max knows Dad will be able to help him feel better. But things go haywire when the aquarium's robot doctor takes over the examination!

programme.title: The Sharkdog Scoop
programme.desc: When Mom is assigned to investigate Sharkdog's wild side for the news, she realizes there's nothing scary about Max's best friend.

programme.title: The Party Animal

programme.title: Compost

programme.title: Richard Rabbit Comes to Play
programme.desc: Richard Rabbit comes to play with George, and Suzy Sheep comes to play with Peppa! The boys and girls don't want to play the same games, but they all like jumping up and down in muddy puddles.

programme.title: Fun Run
programme.desc: Daddy Pig finds it hard work when he runs a race to raise money for the school roof, but it's easier to run when a wasp is chasing him!

programme.title: Washing
programme.desc: Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too – which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Baked Apples / Vegetable Stew

programme.title: Exit Point
programme.desc: Because of prison overcrowding, 12 inmates were sent to an island where they must fight and survive for freedom.

programme.title: Unlucky Plaza
programme.desc: Father. Restaurateur. Hostage taker. How did one man's financial woes spiral into a harrowing crisis that captivated the world?

programme.title: This Time
programme.desc: Coby and Ava only see each other during summer vacations. As time passes, the two develop feelings for each other but having a relationship long-distance is a great challenge for both.

programme.title: A Glimpse of Forever
programme.desc: Glenda (Jasmine Curtis-Smith) pursues comfort in virtual dating to make up for the lack of romance from her real-life partner. But what was meant to be make-believe may turn out to be a genuine connection.

programme.title: Akin Ang Labang Ito
programme.desc: Dario rescues a powerful syndicate head, Don Manolo, from an assassination attempt. Meanwhile, Carlo discovers the Don's business in drugs and he tries to quit.

programme.title: The Gifted
programme.desc: Childhood best friends who are both geniuses in school eventually become bittersweet rivals for campus athlete Mark Ferrer.

programme.title: On Vodka, Beers and Regrets

programme.title: Wangbu

programme.title: Mang Kepweng Returns
programme.desc: When Mang Kepweng died because of mysterious circumstances, he buried with him a secret--aside from his son Zacharias (James Blanco), he had another son named Kiefer (Vhong Navarro.) Kiefer is the heir to the magical bandana that possesses the power to heal any kind of illness.

programme.title: Selda
programme.desc: Sonia, Elena, Linda, Delia and Arlene. Five women from distant rural areas want to redeem their families from poverty. Lured by the glitter of gold in a foreign land, on earth from the people who were supposed to be help them in time of need. A moving story the realities of life behind bars.

programme.title: Krisanta, Iba Ka

programme.title: Dulo

programme.title: Maid in London
programme.desc: Inspired by true events, a young mother, Margo (Andi Eigenmann) and her best friend, Faye (Alexis Navarro) are forced to cling to the edge of a knife so they could travel in the United Kingdom.

programme.title: Dead in the Water
programme.desc: When aspiring photography vlogger Tara gets dumped by her long term boyfriend, her best friend Amy takes her on a weekend getaway to her family's vacation lake house. It is there that they encounter a mysterious and charming man who forces them to face their demons.

programme.title: The Ghost Writer
programme.desc: A struggling writer must write a hit novel to save his career. He retreats to his childhood home where his father, also a successful writer, died mysteriously. Upon discovering his father's final manuscript, he realizes it's far superior to anything he could create. He decides to plagiarize the work, setting off a series of horrifying events.

programme.title: Dorome Boys version
programme.desc: Drama clubs from an all-boys and all-girls high school hold a joint training camp. A series of horrific and ususual events soon take place at the camp and the students learn that an old mountain legend creature, Dorome, is responsible.

programme.title: Bell Chamber
programme.desc: Based on a Thai ghost story of Kuman Thong, the film revolves around a woman who has caused the death of her young brother a long time ago. When she returns to the old house where they lived before, she finds herself haunted by the spirit of her young brother wanting to take revenge for his death.

programme.title: Nightmare of Darkness
programme.desc: A young actress’ Weibo account is refreshed with a new post three years after her death, disclosing her dating picture with young idol Wu Zi Zhen. Wu seeks help from the PR consultant Qiao Shen at his haunted house, but encounters a series of horrifying incidents. After being interrogated by Qiao, Wu lowers his guard and unveils a shocking secret…

programme.title: Dead in the Water
programme.desc: When aspiring photography vlogger Tara gets dumped by her long term boyfriend, her best friend Amy takes her on a weekend getaway to her family's vacation lake house. It is there that they encounter a mysterious and charming man who forces them to face their demons.

programme.title: The Ghost Writer

When she returns to the old house where they lived before, she finds herself haunted by the spirit of her young brother wanting to take revenge for his death.

programme.title: Hollow
programme.desc: Beth, an old woman with early signs of Alzheimer’s disease, moves in to a new house with her daughter’s family. Despite her loss of reality and worsening symptoms, Beth uncovers something sinister observing her every move. A dark and horrific confrontation is about to begin…

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: A single-parent family (Yu Xiang and Tong Tong) move into a new neighbourhood where everyone’s life seems perfect. However, while things may look rosy on the outside, dark secrets and horror raid each family from the inside, and nothing really are as they seem.

programme.title: Rooftop
programme.desc: A group of friends invites Paul to a secret party on their campus rooftop. When a prank accidentally kills Paul, the friends cover up the incident and promised never to disclose it. Paul vows to take revenge by becoming a vicious ghost to haunt them into taking responsibility for their actions.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A taxi driver who is constantly judging others by his own standards, also reads into their every move and sets out to help ‘victims’ in his own way. When a woman he likes seems to be bullied by her son, he goes about setting things right for her, even resorting to turning himself into a cold-blooded serial killer…

programme.title: Inside The Boys
programme.desc: Adapted from a true paranormal event, it is said that people working in the morgue at midnight encounter haunted events as many dead bodies are kept in the college hospital. When a few medical students experience a series of horrifying incidents after leaving the morgue at midnight, the campus is shrouded in terror.

programme.title: Atiku, Gardien Du Territoire

programme.desc: Lately, it seems Jimmy's only solace can be found at the bottom of a whiskey glass. But when Jimmy's estranged son, Mike (The Killing's Joel Kinnaman), becomes a target, Jimmy must make a choice between the crime family he chose and the real family he abandoned long ago. With Mike on the run, Jimmy's only penance for his past mistakes may be to keep his son from the same fate Jimmy is certain he'll face himself...at the wrong end of a gun. Now, with nowhere safe to turn, Jimmy just has one night to figure out exactly where his loyalties lie and to see if he can finally make things right.
